channel.title: CVE Feed for Centire -- Yopify
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Centire -- Yopify

item.title: CVE-2017-3211|2024-09-17T03:12:29.706Z -- centire -- yopify
item.description: Yopify, an e-commerce notification plugin, up to April 06, 2017, leaks the first name, last initial, city, and recent purchase data of customers, all without user authorization.
